Desc: Moves forward to attack enemies. Once it reaches the bottom line, it can be promoted to any chess piece other than the King.
Name: Pawn

Desc: The Knight of Game of Thorns. Leaps across grids when attacking.
Name: Knight

Desc: The Bishop of Game of Thorns. Attacks enemies in diagonals.
Name: Bishop

Desc: The Rook of Game of Thorns. Attacks enemies in straight lines.
Name: Rook

Desc: The Queen of Game of Thorns. Attacks enemies in both straight lines and diagonals.
Name: Queen

Desc: The King of Game of Thorns. Defeat it to win!
Name: King
